thinking: The product in the image is a can of Sprite, which is a lemon-lime flavored soft drink. identification_rationale: Sprite is owned by The Coca-Cola Company, an American corporation, regardless of its international packaging and labeling languages.
potential_alternative_thinking: Looking for European alternatives to Sprite requires identifying European soft drink brands with similar citrus flavors. Schweppes, based in Europe, offers a similar lemon-flavored carbonated drink and is widely available across Europe, including Poland.
potential_alternative: Schweppes Lemonade by Schweppes, headquartered in Switzerland, is a similar European alternative to Sprite.

potential_alternatives.description: Schweppes Lemonade is a lemon-flavored soft drink similar to Sprite. Schweppes is headquartered in Switzerland and has a strong presence in Europe.
